name: Death's Advance
description:
In Death’s Advance, the player will hack and slash enemies on multiple platforms, gain power-ups and discover the truth of how the kingdom obtained such power.

Controls:

Player 1 / Player 2

Movement: W,A,S,D / Keypad 8,4,5,6

Attack: N / Right Arrow

Dash: M / Down Arrow

Restart: R / +

Manual Restart: I
